Food Reactions.question: Do you find that you must follow a very restrictive diet because you have multiple food allergies, sensitivities, and intolerances?
Have you been diagnosed with new onset food sensitivities and allergies in the past 12 months?
Do you experience hives or itchy red skin reactions?
Do you experience bloating and/or gas?
Do you experience constipation and/or diarrhea?
Do you experience abdominal pain with meals?
Do you get headaches or migraines?
Do you experience chronic joint pain, aches, and swelling?
Do you experience persistent skin rashes?
Do you have dark circles under your eyes?

Metabolic Dysfunction.question: Have you noticed unexplained weight gain, especially around the abdomen, even when mindful of diet and lifestyle factors?
Have you experienced significant, unintentional weight loss?
Do you get hangry or feel lightheaded when you skip meals or do not snack between meals?
Do you have insatiable hunger and food cravings?
Do you often feel thirsty, even after drinking plenty of fluids?
Have you been diagnosed with pre-diabetes or type 2 diabetes?
Have you or a close family member been diagnosed with Alzheimer's disease or another type of dementia?
Have you been told by your healthcare provider that you are overweight or obese?
Do you find it difficult to handle and adjust to stressful situations?
Do you crave sweet and starchy foods?

Oral Health.question: Do you have 'silver' amalgam fillings from previous cavities?
Do your gums easily bleed when you brush or floss your teeth?
Are you a smoker or do you chew tobacco regularly?
Have you received any root canals?
Do you have any dental implants?
Have you had dry sockets or infected tooth extractions?
Do you have persistent bad breath, even after brushing and rinsing regularly?
Have you been told you have deep pockets around your wisdom teeth or experienced post-surgical complications after wisdom teeth removal?
Do you often wake up with a sore jaw, headaches, or signs of teeth grinding?

Gut Dysbiosis.question: Do you experience bloating and/or gas?
Do you experience chronic constipation and/or diarrhea?
Do you experience abdominal pain with meals?
Do you experience abdominal cramping and distension after taking certain probiotics?
Do you feel 'drunk' after eating high-carbohydrate foods, even without consuming alcohol?
Do you experience rectal itching and teeth grinding that worsens at night and occurs in cycles around the full moon?
Do you have dark circles under your eyes?
Are you hungry all the time, almost as if a bottomless pit?
Do you consistently crave sweet and starchy foods?
Do you travel internationally in developing nations?
Do you often find that your iron stores (ferritin) remain low, even when following a nutrient-dense diet or taking iron supplements?
Do you notice a thick white coating on your tongue that doesn't go away with brushing?
Do you experience abdominal pain, itchy flushed skin, watery eyes, headaches, and/or brain fog after consuming fermented foods, cured meats, or wine?

Environmental Toxins.question: Do you currently live in, work at, or go to school in a building that has a damp or mildewy odor?
Do you notice that your symptoms decrease or disappear when you go on vacation or spend time in a different location for at least a few days?
Do you find it difficult to breathe through your nose, causing you to frequently breathe through your mouth?
Do you wake up routinely during the night with attacks of coughing?
Do you consider yourself particularly sensitive to electromagnetic frequencies (EMFs)?
Have you been diagnosed with high blood pressure?
Have you or a close family member been diagnosed with Alzheimer's disease or another type of dementia?
Have you been told that you have hormone issues?
Do you tend to feel sensitive to chemicals such as perfumes, cleaning products, laundry detergents, or exhaust fumes, and experience symptoms like headaches, lightheadedness, or nausea when exposed?
Do you notice significant puffiness, swelling, or water retention in your face, arms, and/or legs?
Do you get a metallic taste in your mouth?
Do you eat tuna, shark, swordfish, or Atlantic salmon more than twice per week?
Are you an electrician, handle electronic devices, or do home renovations, including painting?
Do you currently or have you previously lived in a mining community or are you involved in construction, soldering, or glass staining?

Foreign Objects/Substances.question: Have you been diagnosed with an autoimmune disorder?
Have you been injured or received a life-altering diagnosis after receiving a vaccine?
Do you have any silicone implants?
Do you have metal implants, dermal fillers, polypropylene mesh, or any other device/material implanted in your body?
Have you ever been diagnosed with chronic fatigue syndrome, lupus, multiple sclerosis, dysautonomia, scleroderma, or Guillain-Barré Syndrome?
Do you experience persistent skin rashes?
Do you experience tingling, numbness, burning, or stabbing sensations?
Do you experience heart palpitations, a racing heart while at rest, or occasional skipped beats?
Do you often feel ill, similar to having flu-like symptoms?

Stealth Infections.question: Have you ever been bitten by a tick?
Have you ever had a bullseye rash on any part of your body?
Do you experience unexplained fevers, sweats, and chills?
Do you experience tingling, numbness, burning, or stabbing sensations?
Do you experience heart palpitations, a racing heart while at rest, or occasional skipped beats?
Do you often experience a sore throat, enlarged tonsils, and/or swollen lymph nodes in your neck?
Do you experience chronic ear buzzing, ringing, and/or pain?
Do you experience 'air hunger,' where you feel like you're suffocating and struggling to breathe?
Do you experience chronic pelvic or testicular pain?
Do you notice dark urine with or without blood?
Have you ever been diagnosed with a heart murmur, valve prolapse, endocarditis, or myocarditis?
Do you experience pain along your shin bone or in the heels or soles of your feet?
Have you noticed you have a stretch mark-like rash on your back, arms, legs, or abdomen, but not from being overweight?
Do you experience persistent, widespread aches and pains?
Do you find yourself disoriented (getting lost, going to wrong places), confused, or forgetful (poor short-term memory)?
Do you experience flushing, increased heart rate, and faintness with minimal exertion (such as going up a flight of stairs) or at rest?

Nervous System Dysregulation.question: Do you often feel wired, like you can't shut off your mind, yet still feel exhausted?
Do you have trouble falling asleep (without medication)?
Have you been diagnosed with high blood pressure?
Have you been told that you have hormone issues?
Do you find yourself highly sensitive and reactive to your environment, where even minor events or interactions trigger anxiety or panic?
Do you find yourself overwhelmed, mentally exhausted, and highly emotionally reactive/snippy?
Did you grow up in a home where you were verbally, physically, or sexually abused?
Did you grow up with absent parents due to alcoholism, divorce, mental illness, or incarceration?
Does your drive for perfection or workaholism interfere with your happiness or impact your quality of life?
Do you have a hard time communicating your needs and/or boundaries?
Have you been diagnosed with a mood disorder such as anxiety, depression, or bipolar?
Do you experience heart palpitations, a racing heart while at rest, or occasional skipped beats?
Do you find it difficult to handle and adjust to stressful situations?
